title: vladimirdju
author: vladimirdju
content: Hello everyone, I am Vladimir, the CEO/CTO of Reflecto (RTO). I am thrilled to share information about our upcoming technology release.Over the course of 2021 and 2022, my team and I dedicated ourselves to developing cutting-edge web5 technology with the incorporation of AI. We are proud to announce that we have successfully created two patented solutions that will be unveiled on April 5th.I cordially invite you to join us on our social media platform, https://linktr.ee/reflectocoin, and participate in our demo. Witness this remarkable technology that has the potential to revolutionize crypto adoption.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Does this revolutionary web5 have any bounties, airdrops etc? I was starting to digest web3 and now you are telling me there is already a web5? I'm a CEO/CTO of a revolutionary shilling/ pumping/ FUDing company.Allow me to demonstrate some of my greatest achievements in this field:"Wow, great project""Wow, cool project""Wow, this is interesting""Wow, I'm watching this""Wow"The last one I haden't have the time to revise it carefully, but it still works. Hit me at: greenctoceo@gmail.com ðŸ˜‰

comments.author: vladimirdju
comments.body: We are first to develop web5 tech. It's a mix of Web2 and Web3 and we're pretty excited about it. We're not doing any airdrops right now, but we're hopeful that if it catches on, the value will go through the roof. If you're interested, feel free to check out our Telegram channel for more info!Quote from: digaran on March 19, 2023, 09:46:27 PMDoes this revolutionary web5 have any bounties, airdrops etc? I was starting to digest web3 and now you are telling me there is already a web5? I'm a CEO/CTO of a revolutionary shilling/ pumping/ FUDing company.Allow me to demonstrate some of my greatest achievements in this field:"Wow, great project""Wow, cool project""Wow, this is interesting""Wow, I'm watching this""Wow"The last one I haden't have the time to revise it carefully, but it still works. Hit me at: greenctoceo@gmail.com ðŸ˜‰

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: Quote from: vladimirdju on March 19, 2023, 10:01:05 PMWe are first to develop web5 tech. It's a mix of Web2 and Web3 and we're pretty excited about it. We're not doing any airdrops right now, but we're hopeful that if it catches on, the value will go through the roof. If you're interested, feel free to check out our Telegram channel for more info!If you want to scam someone, you better do it somewhere else.QuoteThe team behind web5 is led by Jack Dorsey, the former CEO of Twitter and current CEO of Square. He is also the founder of The Block, a subsidiary company focusing on building new financial infrastructure using bitcoin technology. The Block announced plans to build a new decentralized web (web5) centered on Bitcoin at the beginning of this year - https://beincrypto.com/learn/web5-explained/
